title: Post n.1
body: Hello everyone, I hope you like my simple blog! This is something I made from scratch in order to demonstrate my skills in Javascript, both front and back end.

comments.text: Super cool the way it looks!
I'm glad to see that create and update a comment works!

title: Post n.2
body: This is an example of a blog post.

title: Post n.3
body: This blog post is meant to demonstrate the capabilities of blog app APIs
